attributes.action: change the rules governing the post of Speaker of the House of Commons to allow Brian Blessed and other weekly guests
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to change the rules governing the post of Speaker of the House of Commons. Rather than a full time position, allow weekly guest speakers - starting with Brian Blessed. Other guests to be announced later.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
